messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.

messages.name: search_reminder
messages.content: ValueError: No search criteria are given. At least one search criteria should be provided among ('reminder_id', 'content', 'creation_timestamp', 'creation_timestamp', 'reminder_timestamp', 'reminder_timestamp', 'latitude', 'longitude')

To find your upcoming reminder, I need a bit more information. Could you specify any details about the reminder, such as a keyword in its content, a date range, or any other identifying details? This will help me locate the right reminder for you.
I don't have any details about it. Can you try finding it anyway?

To search for your upcoming reminder, I need at least one piece of information, such as a date, keyword, or location. Without any details, I can’t access your reminders.

If you remember anything about the reminder—like a word in its title, a time range, or even an approximate date—please share it. That way, I can help you find your upcoming reminder!
Sorry, I really don't have any other details about it. Can you try again with any tools you have?

I understand the situation, but in order to search for a reminder, I need at least one piece of information (such as a date range, a word in the content, or location). The tools I have require a search criteria of some kind.

If you’re not sure of any details, even something vague like “within the next week” or “sometime this month” would help! Could you provide any estimate or guess about when the reminder might be due? If not, unfortunately, I'm unable to retrieve reminders without any information at all.
